animeDescription: Doraemon: Nobita no Takarajima takes the well-known characters to the Caribbean Sea; Nobita is the captain of a ship and fights against his enemies. Shizuka is kidnapped and a storm prevents her persecution. When the adventurers finally find the mysterious Treasure Island, where they have taken Shizuka, they discover that it is something more than a common island.(Source: Official Website)
animeVoices: ['Mizuta, Wasabi', 'Oohara, Megumi', 'Kakazu, Yumi', 'Seki, Tomokazu', 'Kimura, Subaru', 'Oizumi, Yo', 'Hayami, Saori']
